segments.text: I see the way the boy’s eyes light up when he gets closer to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sight that’s both adorable and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl standing below him, her arm raised high, eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, almost like a tiny acolyte worshiping at an altar of snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool! It looks like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I wonder if they realize the risk they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can this innocent act of taking cookies feel so reckless and dangerous?
segments.speaker: PAR
